Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be reached after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all process variants that include this activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where the manuscript ultimately leads to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Minimum waiting time to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision following the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in complex review paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where at least one SW-Reviewer Declined preceded SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to the elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in first-round reviews versus revised manuscript rounds (e.g., comparing SW-* and RW-* prefixed activities preceding it)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Time from the final SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants containing reminder activities (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed after the first SW-Reviewer Agreed in multi-reviewer assignment scenarios
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in high-efficiency variants (those with performance under the median variant duration)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured as the interval between its start (implied by prior activity completion) and the subsequent EIC decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, etc.)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision grouped by case:concept:name in submissions that required multiple reviewer agreements (e.g., more than one SW-Reviewer Agreed event)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
